tickets.description:
* Valid on bus (also valid on tram/train in zone A)
* Not valid on the nightbus and nighttram
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding
* Cannot be refunded

[Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/single-ticket/)

* Can be purchased between 00:30-04:00 night on Saturday and Sunday
* Valid for night buses 101-116, 4101 and night tram
* Valid for a single trip, but does not provide transfers
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding
* Cannot be refunded

[Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/night-bus/)

* Valid on bus (also valid on tram/train in zone A)
* Not valid on nightbus and nighttram
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding
* Cannot be refunded

 [Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/24hour-ticket/)

* Valid on bus (also valid on tram/train in zone A)
* Valid on nightbus and nighttram except for adult category
* Valid for an unlimited number of trips in selected zones
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding

 [Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/7day-ticket/)
included_services: The ticket includes free use of of city bikes from Tronehim City Bike.
The ticket includes 2 hours free use of rental cars from Hyre each month.

tickets.description:
* Valid on bus (also valid on tram/train in zone A)
* Not valid on nightbus and nighttram
* Only one ticket can be activated at a time
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding

 [Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/single-ticket/)

* Applies to travellers from 16 to 19 years old inclusive
* Valid on bus and express boat in Tr√∏ndelag county (also applies to tram/train in zone A)
* Valid on nightbus and nighttram
* Valid for the entire journey if the ticket is valid when boarding

[Conditions and zones](https://www.atb.no/en/youth-ticket/)
